EmailTemplate.name: MyGDC - Global Data Center Approved/Denied Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Access to MyGDC - Global Data Center has been {!Contact_Tool_Access__c.Request_Status__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact_Tool_Access__c.Contact_Name__c},
Your registration request for the following online tool is {!Contact_Tool_Access__c.Request_Status__c}. If you need any further assistance, please reply to this e-mail or use the "Contact Us Form" within the MyAerospace portal.
MyGDC - Global Data Center
Thank you for your continued business with Honeywell Aerospace.
MyAerospace Portal Team
